Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory92.png'}
{3: 'Sergey and Antonov take you and the others near the dock, where two huge red ships are berthed in the shallow water.'}
{3: 'The two ships have been reinforced and connected with boards and other structures. A large number of houses and equipment are arranged both on and around the ships.'}
{3: 'It seems to be dinnertime. Bright lights are illuminating the ships; shouts and noises can be faintly heard in the distance.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Sergey', 3: 'It has been several years since Vardim, the executive officer of Kyaranta, banished them here. How do you think the nearly 2,000 commune members survived the Arctic winter?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: 'Without the two well-preserved and unused reactors on the Moses class ships, we would have turned into ice sculptures.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: 'Electricity, heat, steam... Everything depends on these two reactors.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Looking at the conflicted expression on Staessen's face, Antonov takes a hard drag from his freshly lit cigarette."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Antonov', 3: "It's not that we don't trust you... If we could have stayed in Kyaranta, it wouldn't have come to this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: 'But when that Vardim guy expelled us on the basis of our "aggression" causing equality issues, the ARU stayed silent on the matter.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "That's because...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sergey', 3: "It's alright. We don't blame you. The ARU was busy dealing with Derek at the time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: 'But it is what it is. Even if we cut Vardim to pieces, that would inevitably harm those in Kyaranta.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sergey', 3: "So do you understand? We can't just hand over the two Moses class ships so easily.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Captain, I agree with them. If you really want us to take the ships, the Forest Guards... would rather continue to live as sinners.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sergey', 3: "So, you're a Construct... Are you a member of the Forest Guards?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yes, please allow me to express my admiration for your unwavering perseverance.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sergey', 3: "It's all for the sake of survival...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Indeed, it's all for the sake of survival. We can't ask you to give up your only means of survival just for our sake.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Haha, you two are getting along well, eh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "Everything's just not going to plan...", 4: '1'}
